documents.body:
# HI...

Welcome to `product name`... Thanks you for trying this early alpha version. Not to much is fully up and running, but feel free to poke around, but don't expect it to work and don't expect never version to be able to read your data.

This is an interactive note application which at some point will get:
* Full offline support
* Powerful search (event `JavaScript`filtering)
* Support for running `JavaScript` snippets in documents
* Module creation for creating reusable snippets
* LaTex support (`$$E=mc^2$$`)
* Syncing of document across devices
* Cross document linking and inclusion
* File attachments with JS access
* Protected variables for service credentials
* A lot more
